about_us.title: About us
about_us.intro_welcome: Welcome to Piano Home Furniture, where elegance meets comfort!
about_us.paragraph_1: We specialize in creating beautifully crafted furniture that blends modern aesthetics with timeless functionality. Our mission is to bring your home to life with pieces that are not just furniture, but a reflection of your style and personality.
about_us.paragraph_2: What sets us apart is our commitment to excellence. Our team of experienced designers and craftsmen work closely to bring you furniture that not only looks stunning but feels like home. We pay attention to every detail, ensuring each piece is functional, comfortable, and built to last. Whether you're redecorating a room or furnishing a new home, Piano Home Furniture is here to help you create a space that you'll love. We are passionate about making your home as beautiful and unique as you are.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro_paragraph: At Piano Home Furniture, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or make a purchase.
privacy.collect_intro: We may collect the following types of information:
privacy.collect_personal_info_desc: This includes your name, email address, phone number, billing and shipping addresses, and payment details when you place an order or create an account.
privacy.collect_browsing_info_desc: We collect non-personal data such as your IP address, browser type, and usage data through cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience.
privacy.collect_communication_desc: If you contact us via email, phone, or online forms, we may collect the details of those communications.
privacy.use_intro: The information we collect is used for:
privacy.use_orders_desc: To process and ship your order, communicate with you about your purchase, and provide customer support.
privacy.use_improve_desc: To analyze website performance, monitor usage trends, and improve our product offerings and customer experience.
privacy.use_marketing_desc: With your consent, we may send you promotional emails or newsletters about new products, special offers, or updates to our services.
privacy.use_legal_desc: To comply with applicable laws and regulations or respond to lawful requests from public authorities.
privacy.protect_desc: We take the security of your personal information seriously and use industry-standard measures such as encryption and secure servers to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
privacy.sharing_intro: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
privacy.sharing_service_providers_desc: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who help us operate our website, process payments, and fulfill orders.
privacy.sharing_legal_desc: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to legal requests.
privacy.cookies_desc: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website, such as remembering your preferences and providing personalized content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.rights_access: Access the personal information we hold about you.
privacy.rights_update: Update or correct any inaccuracies in your data.
privacy.rights_opt_out: Opt-out of marketing communications at any time by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in our emails or contacting us directly.
privacy.changes_desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review it periodically to stay informed.

return.intro: At Piano Home Furniture, we prioritize customer satisfaction and want you to be completely happy with your purchase. If for any reason you’re not satisfied with your furniture, we’re here to help.

eligibility.title: Eligibility for Returns
eligibility.point_1: Items must be returned within 30 days of receiving your order.
eligibility.point_2: The furniture must be in its original condition, unused, and with all original packaging and tags.
eligibility.point_3: Custom or personalized items are non-refundable unless they arrive damaged or defective.

initiation.title: How to Initiate a Return
initiation.step_1_text: Reach out to our customer service team at [email/phone number] to start the return process. Please provide your order number, item details, and the reason for the return.
initiation.step_2_text: Safely repack the furniture in its original packaging. Ensure all parts, instructions, and accessories are included.
initiation.step_3_text: We will provide you with a return shipping label, or you can choose your own shipping method. Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer, unless the item is defective or damaged upon arrival.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.text: Once we receive your returned item and inspect it, we will process your refund. Refunds will be issued to your original payment method within 7-10 business days. Shipping fees are non-refundable unless the return is due to a defect or error on our part.

damaged.title: Damaged or Defective Items
damaged.text: If your furniture arrives damaged or defective, please notify us within 48 hours of delivery. We will arrange for a replacement, repair, or full refund at no additional cost.

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.text: We do not offer direct exchanges. If you wish to exchange an item, please return the original item and place a new order.
